text:
Kailyn Lowry Sets The Record Straight: “I Didn’t Leave Javi For Anyone”

by 0 Shares

Advertisement

Kailyn Lowry is still playing coy about whether she’s gay or straight, but there’s one thing she’s certainly okay with confirming — she did not leave her husband for anyone. The Teen Mom 2 rumor mill has been busier than usual this week ever since Kail posted (and deleted) a Snapchat photo in which she’s kissing her gay best friend, Rebecca Hayter, on the lips. PHOTOS: Kailyn And Her Rumored Gal Pal Certainly Aren’t Denying Those Rumors



Now the internet is convinced they’re a couple... even blaming Becky for causing a rift in her marriage to Javi Marroquin!



But the mom of two is not about these rumors, debunking them on social media with one straight-to-the-point tweet:

I didn't leave javi for anyone though Kail Lowry (@KailLowry) June 9, 2016

“I didn’t leave Javi for anyone though,” Kail wrote to her 1.1 million followers. Sorry, Becky Hayter haters...she didn’t break these two up! NEWS: Teen Mom Producer Responds to Backlash About The Show Javi, on the other hand, has officially returned to Twitter just in time to comment on all the hearsay...but he is staying out of it this time because he doesn't want to "bash my son's mother." Fair enough.

I'm gonna keep my mouth shut about all these stupid false stories cause I'm not gonna bash my sons mother so we'll leave it at that Javi marroquin (@Javimarroquin9) June 9, 2016

And sure, cheating rumors have plagued these guys for months, but anyone who tuned into the Teen Mom 2 Season 7 finale knows the real reason the couple of almost four years called it quits — he wants another baby and Kailyn doesn’t. PHOTOS: Both Kailyn and Javi Share Pictures With Other Women! "If you’re not going to change your mind I'll always resent you and I won’t be happy with my life because I wanted more kids,” Javi tells his wife via Facetime in the super emotional ep. “I don’t want to do that to you, I don’t want to do that to the kids. I don’t think I can change my mind.”

Credit: MTV

And since their separation — which reportedly happened in December — both of Lincoln’s parents seem to be getting on with their separate lives. Javi is still deployed overseas with the Air Force, and Kailyn is at home with her two boys and finishing up her final semesters at Delaware State University.
title: Kailyn Lowry Sets The Record Straight: “I Didn’t Leave Javi For Anyone”
